name: AttributeScopes.FoundationAttributes.LinkAttribute
desc: A type for using a link as an attribute.

items.name: static var name: String
items.desc: The name of the link attribute.

items.name: static func value(for: NSObject) -> URL
items.desc: Returns the URL value of the specified object.

items.name: typealias AttributeScopes.FoundationAttributes.LinkAttribute.Value
items.desc: The type of the link attribute’s value.

items.name: static func objectiveCValue(for: URL) -> NSObject
items.desc: Returns an object for a specified URL value.

items.name: typealias AttributeScopes.FoundationAttributes.LinkAttribute.ObjectiveCValue
items.desc: The type of the link attribute’s value when calling it from Objective-C.

items.name: static func decode(from: Decoder) -> URL
items.desc: Decodes an attribute value from the given decoder.

items.name: static func encode(URL, to: Encoder)
items.desc: Encodes an attribute value to the given encoder.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A string that represents the attribute.
